text: 4.10 Lep 4.4, 4.9, 5.1, 5.7-8, 5.13-14, 6.16, 7.15, 19.4, 21.5 Aplanelak, 24 bɨawl okok, kɨli jɨj sɨŋak kɨgom yɨmɨl, bɨ bɨnonɨm besɨg mɨdep adek yek ak nop gos anep lɨlɨg Bɨawl yɨbɨl ak pel pelnep yenɨgab agɨlɨg, nag kɨmɨg cheg lɨlak ak tɨg asɨkɨlak. Tɨg asɨkɨl ne yek sɨŋak dɨyokɨl, yɨb nop dad aplanɨlɨg agɨlak,
